## Manifest.fetch() method

Fetch a Manifest

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fetch({ blocks, address }: Fetch, options?: FetchOptions): Promise<Manifest>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { blocks, address } | Fetch |  |
|  options | [FetchOptions](./opal.fetchoptions.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Manifest](./opal.manifest.md)<!-- -->&gt;


## Remarks

Fetches the manifest for the address provided. The blocks api is used to fetch the data.
